channel.title: 经济学人
channel.description: 这是一个追踪经济学人news的种子

item.title: 中国民族主义者正试图重塑龙的形象。北京官员希望他们的国家有一个更友好的象征👇。
item.description: Chinese nationalists are trying to rebrand the dragon. Officials in Beijing want a more friendly symbol for their country econ.st/3I7zOPk 👇

item.title: 管理一流大学是美国最难的工作吗？平衡各利益方之间的关系几乎变得不可能 👇
item.description: Is running a top university America’s hardest job? Balancing a motley crew of interested parties is becoming nearly impossible econ.st/3UKnigp 👇

item.title: 一个品牌一旦为人们所熟悉，就更容易向顾客推销更多的东西，而且价格也会更高。Temu和Shein可能已经完成了在美国发展最困难的部分 👇 。
item.description: Once a brand is familiar, it is easier to sell customers more things—and more expensive ones, too. Temu and Shein may have already done the hardest part of making it in America econ.st/3UOpjbz 👇

item.title: 中国能否利用生成式人工智能的力量？在我们的 "鼓楼 "播客中，@aliceysu 和 @donweinland 讨论了 Ernie Bot，它对 ChatGPT 🎧 的回答。
item.description: Will China be able to harness the power of generative AI? On our “Drum Tower” podcast @aliceysu and @donweinland discuss Ernie Bot, its answer to ChatGPT econ.st/48pWyF2 🎧

item.title:
美国的大学在学习责任和社会正义之间徘徊，而这是任何一位校长都难以解决的矛盾。这给所有组织带来了更广泛的启示
插图布雷特-莱德
item.description:
America’s universities are torn between their responsibilities to learning and social justice—and that is a tension any president will find hard to resolve. This carries wider lessons for all organisations econ.st/48lnXrK

Illustration: Brett Ryder

item.title: 为防止另一场灾难性的地区战争，世界需要迫使卢旺达从刚果撤军 👇
item.description: To prevent another catastrophic regional war, the world needs to press Rwanda to pull back its forces from Congo econ.st/48m8WWN 👇

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普面临四起刑事案件。如果他在 11 月获胜，并在就职前被定罪和判刑，会发生什么情况？ ⬇️
item.description: Donald Trump faces four criminal cases. What would happen if he wins in November, and gets convicted and sentenced in any of these before taking office? econ.st/3T7K7cw ⬇️

item.title: 石油和天然气公司表现出的兴趣表明，电气化可能是净化工业的答案。如果连它的天敌都能看到它的价值，那么它的前景一定是光明的 👇。
item.description: One indication that electrification may be the answer to cleaning up industry is the interest shown by oil and gas companies. If even its natural enemies can see its worth, the prospects must be decent econ.st/42Ktvuw 👇

item.title:
在今年的美国大选中，赌注异常之大：选举结果可能会影响 2024 年的国家和世界事务，这是前所未有的。
通过《美国简讯》了解最重要的政治新闻，我们的每日时事通讯 ⬇️
item.description:
In America’s elections this year the stakes are unusually high: the outcome could shape national and world affairs like no other in 2024.

Stay up to date on the most important political news with The US in brief, our daily newsletter econ.st/3OQlkav ⬇️

item.title:
在经历了糟糕的几年之后，俄罗斯间谍正在转祸为福。
克里姆林宫情报机构的更新正值东西方竞争的关键时刻👇。
item.description:
After a terrible couple of years, Russian spies are turning disaster into opportunity.

The renewal of the Kremlin’s intelligence apparatus comes at a crucial moment in east-west competition econ.st/3UFoth8 👇

item.title: 派拉蒙的市值在过去两年中下降了一半，不到 90 亿美元。派拉蒙的问题表明好莱坞正面临更广泛的混乱👇。
item.description: Paramount’s market value has fallen by half in the past two years, to under $9bn. Its problems point to wider disruption in Hollywood econ.st/3uI1Qhi 👇

item.title: 俄罗斯越来越危险，美国越来越不可靠，而欧洲仍然毫无准备。鉴于军事规划的周期较长，欧洲需要从今天开始纠正这种状况👇。
item.description: Russia is becoming more dangerous, America is less reliable and Europe remains unprepared. Given the long cycles in military planning, Europe needs to start putting this right today econ.st/48vltqK 👇

item.title: 感染并非引发长期慢性病的唯一原因。发现感染后疾病之间的相似之处可能会带来更好的治疗👇。
item.description: Long covid is not the only chronic condition triggered by infection. Finding similarities between post-infectious illnesses could lead to better treatments econ.st/49jj1VA 👇

item.title: 乌克兰战争和亚洲日益加剧的紧张局势已将美国陆军引向一个关键时刻。它正在与有关其规模、形式和目的的问题搏斗，这些问题最终将触及它与美国社会的关系👇。
item.description: The war in Ukraine and rising tensions in Asia have led the US Army to a pivotal moment. It is wrestling with questions over its size, shape and purpose, matters that will eventually touch its relationship to American society econ.st/3T1BkJ8 👇

item.title: 阿根廷的自由主义总统正在美国访问。与其试图模仿特朗普的狂轰滥炸，他不如就近寻求经济建议 ⬇️
item.description: Argentina’s libertarian president is visiting America. Rather than try to emulate Trumpian bombast, he should look closer to home for economic advice econ.st/3URGg4U ⬇️

item.title: 这些美国城市对狗情有独钟--它们的爪子可能不是你想象的那种 🐾
item.description: These American cities are obsessed with dogs—and they are paw-bably not the ones you think econ.st/3wp88Tz 🐾

item.title: Martine Moïse 否认指控，许多海地人认为这些指控是政治 ⬇️
item.description: Martine Moïse denies the allegations, and many in Haiti think that the charges are political econ.st/3ONKZjV ⬇️

item.title: 相对于平均工资而言，在布达佩斯独自租房几乎和在纽约一样困难。在欧洲哪里独自生活最经济实惠？ 👇
item.description: Renting alone in Budapest is almost as difficult as it is in New York, relative to average wages. Where in Europe is it most affordable to live solo? econ.st/3ORTeeS 👇

item.title: 没有美国，欧洲能自卫吗？它需要取代军事援助、核保护伞和领导权👇。
item.description: Can Europe defend itself without America? It would need to replace military aid, a nuclear umbrella and leadership econ.st/48rWhBn 👇

item.title: 5 马赫是新的 1 马赫。正如昔日的飞行员寻求突破音障和超音速飞行一样，现在人们正在寻找 "高超音速 "飞行的可靠方法，"高超音速 "一般定义为音速的五倍以上👇。
item.description: Mach 5 is the new Mach 1. Just as aviators of old sought to break the sound barrier and travel supersonically, the search is now on for reliable ways to travel “hypersonically”, generally defined as more than five times the speed of sound econ.st/42SLlf1 👇

item.title: 美国军队的未来如何？在其领导人中，有三大问题悬而未决： 👇
item.description: What is the future of America’s army? Among its leaders there are three big unsettled questions: econ.st/3I3V1tJ 👇

item.title:
♦️ 中国谴责美国否决联合国安理会关于加沙立即停火的决议。
♦️ 巴基斯坦两个最大的亲建制党派同意组建联合政府。
♦️ 英伟达从最近的人工智能热潮中获益。
关注今日新闻 👇
item.description:
♦️ China condemns America for vetoing a proposed UN Security Council resolution for an immediate ceasefire in Gaza.

♦️ Pakistan’s two biggest pro-establishment parties agree to form a coalition government.

♦️ Nvidia benefits from the recent AI boom.

Follow today’s news 👇

item.title: 收购派拉蒙之战标志着一个好莱坞王朝的衰落--同时也显示出娱乐业的现状令人遗憾👇。
item.description: The battle to buy Paramount marks the fading of a Hollywood dynasty—and shows the sorry state of the entertainment industry econ.st/3wo7nuc 👇

item.title: 我们正在招聘一名通讯员，负责对中国进行雄心勃勃、富有想象力和原创性的报道。截止日期为 2 月 23 日，详情请点击此处： 👇
item.description: We are hiring a correspondent to provide ambitious, imaginative and original coverage of China. The closing date is February 23rd and details are here: econ.st/47zBk7g 👇

item.title:
♦️ 尼基-黑莉誓言继续参加共和党总统初选。
♦️ 拜登政府表示，阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼死后将受到 "重大制裁"。
♦️ 美国国会驳回一起多元化案件。
关注美国政治最新动态 👉
item.description:
♦️ Nikki Haley vows to stay in the Republican presidential primary.

♦️ “Major sanctions” will follow Alexei Navalny’s death, says the Biden administration.

♦️ SCOTUS dismisses a diversity case.

Follow the latest in US politics 👉 econ.st/3I4SIXc

item.title: 一些中国民族主义者给唐纳德-特朗普起的绰号表明，这位前总统的过激行为使中国变得更加强大。习近平也这样看他吗？ 👇
item.description: The nickname some Chinese nationalists have given to Donald Trump suggests that the former president’s excesses make China stronger. Does Xi Jinping see him that way too? econ.st/3TfRnDz 👇

item.title: 对于日本的半导体工具制造商来说，中美关系的恶化为他们带来了商机。但在未来，这可能会成为一种压力👇。
item.description: For Japan’s semiconductor toolmakers the deteriorating relationship between America and China is a boon for business. In the future, though, it may become a strain econ.st/3UJxzJU 👇

item.title: 社会对我们狂轰滥炸，要求我们变得更快乐、更健康、更富有。为什么我们变得如此不满足于平凡？ 👇
item.description: Society bombards us with instructions to be happier, fitter and richer. Why have we become so dissatisfied with being ordinary? econ.st/3SNWklg 👇

item.title: 治疗 1 型糖尿病的新疗法正在出现。诀窍在于战胜免疫系统 👇
item.description: New treatments are emerging for type-1 diabetes. The trick is to outsmart the immune system econ.st/3SH0StM 👇

item.title: 乌克兰东部的城镇担心自己会成为俄罗斯的下一个目标。阿夫杰夫卡沦陷后，下一个目标会是哪？ 👇
item.description: Towns in eastern Ukraine fear they will be Russia’s next target. After the fall of Avdiivka, where will be next? econ.st/3T6CwuQ 👇
